overview: Honey Wilder goes wild in this classic flick! We open with Jeanna Fine and Buddy Love getting it on in the yard. Then Jerry Butler dips into the Honey pot on the sly. Keisha does two scenes in a row after that- one with Randy Paul, and then a threesome with Jerry Butler and Joey Silvera in the bath. Honey Wilder then rewards Toni Bush for finding her purse. And after a hard day's work, Honey unwinds in bed with Randy Paul.
title: Lust Tango In Paris
